title: fileSize
description: fileSize validation  template driven  allows user to enter the input which is in the proper file size format.
htmlContent:
When to use

Suppose you want to create a UserInfo form, which contains fields like fileType , videoFile , audioFile and imageFile, documentFile ,contactFile, profilePicture and you want the user to enter input which is a proper size format. Here depending upon the requirement, these scenarios may arise..

  1. Allow videoFile which have proper size format and adding Custom Message on videoFile.
  2. Apply validation on documentFile field based on matched condition in the form, like if the fileType is 'Document', then the documentFile must be a size format (Used as a function).
  3. Apply validation on imageFile field based on matched condition in the form, like if the device is 'SmartPhone', then the imageFile must be a size format (Used as a string datatype).
  4. Apply fileSize validation dynamically based on server rules.
    5.

Let's see how fileSize template driven fulfil the need.

Basic fileSize Validation

First we need to create a UserInfo model and define a property of videoFile in the model to achieve the functional need of point 1.

Through Angular FormBuilder service we create FormGroup in the component.

SizeConfig

Below options are not mandatory to use in the fileSize validation. If needed then use the below options.

OptionDescription
maxSize Maximum file size allowed to be entered.
conditionalExpressionFileSize validation should be applied if the condition is matched in the conditionalExpression function. Validation framework will pass two parameters at the time of conditionalExpression check. Those two parameters are current FormGroup value and root FormGroup value. You can apply the condition on respective object value.If there is need of dynamic validation means it is not fixed in client code, it will change based on some criterias. In this scenario you can bind the expression based on the expression value is coming from the web server in string format. The conditionalExpression will work as same as client function.
messageTo override the global configuration message and set the custom error message on respective FormControl

maxSize

Type : number

maxSize parameter is the maximum file size allowed to be entered by the user.

conditionalExpression

Type : Function | string

fileSize validation should be applied if the condition is matched in the conditionalExpression function. Validation framework will pass two parameters at the time of conditionalExpression check. Those two parameters are current FormGroup value and root FormGroup value. You can apply the condition on respective object value.

If there is need of dynamic validation means it is not fixed in client code, it will change based on some criterias. In this scenario you can bind the expression based on the expression value is coming from the web server in string format. The conditionalExpression will work as same as client function.

Binding conditionalExpression with Function object.

Binding conditionalExpression with string object.

message

Type : string

To override the global configuration message and set the custom message on respective FormControl.
